description: This file defines a React functional component named ChatPanel, providing a chat interface with message display, input handling, and interaction with a backend API for sending and receiving messages.

methods.name: ChatPanel
methods.description: React component for chat interface with message state management, input handling, and API interaction.

methods.name: onSend
methods.description: Handles sending user message, invoking API, updating message state with assistant reply or error message.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keyboard input, triggers message sending on Enter key press.
